name: Shit Bowling VR
description:
VR Sports is a game made for the EC6 game jam, and my own first VR game! It's something I may come back to with an update or patch to make it higher quality. I really appreciate the support of my friends and family during the making of this game and thanks to the Extra Credits team for having me! I'm likely to make a Quest port in the near future, I'm currently struggling due to my inexperience there.

The game is made in Unity, with almost all assets being mine or from wii sports, in an attempt to emulate the experience. Quite a few ideas had been discussed for this game, such as seeing characters known as "pill boys" bowling alongside you or the idea of a online scoreboard, but in the end, for my own first venture into VR and in the short amount of time I spent working on the game directly, I'm quite happy with it.
